# gml2step docs

Official documentation for gml2step (CityGML to STEP conversion toolkit).

Primary docs:
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/ja/

Core references:
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/installation/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/cli/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/api/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/conversion/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/configuration/
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/en/plateau/

Repository:
- https://github.com/Soynyuu/gml2step

Machine-readable long context:
- https://soynyuu.github.io/gml2step/llms-full.txt
